name: Rowlet
flavorText: This wary Pokemon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Popplio
flavorText: This Pokemon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snorlax-GX
Attack1Text: This Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: This attack can be used if this Pokemon is Asleep. If it is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

name: Rockruff
flavorText: It's considered to be a good Pokemon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

name: Pikipek
flavorText: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses holes for food storage and for nesting.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Togedemaru
flavorText: The long hairs on its back act as lightning rods. The bolts of lightning it attracts are stored as energy in its electric sac.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Shiinotic
flavorText: It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokemon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Bruxish
flavorText: It stuns its prey with psychokinesis and then grinds them to mush with its strong teeth. Even Shellder's shell is no match for it.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Passimian
flavorText: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkableâ€”they will never let down a comrade.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Passimian.

name: Oranguru
flavorText: Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this Pokemon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up at the beach to match wits with Slowking.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Lycanroc-GX
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Zygarde
flavorText: This is Zygarde's form at times when it uses its overwhelming power to suppress those who endanger the ecosystem.

name: Solgaleo-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for up to 5 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Lunala-GX
Ability1Text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy from 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't be healed during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Basic Pokemon that isn't a Pokemon-GX. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Alolan Sandslash
flavorText: Fleeing a volcanic eruption, it settled on a snowy mountain. As it races through the snowfields, it sends up a spray of snow.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card.
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Oricorio
flavorText: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Its elegant, attractive dance will send the minds and hearts of its enemies to another world.
Attack1Text: For each Pokemon in your opponent's discard pile, put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: If there is no Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

name: Mudsdale
flavorText: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 40 damage to itself.

name: Drampa
flavorText: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy from this Pokemon to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Rowlet
flavorText: This wary Pokemon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: Litten
flavorText: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Popplio
flavorText: This Pokemon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

name: Lurantis
flavorText: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis's vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.
Ability1Text: The attacks of your Grass Pokemon and Fire Pokemon do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Tsareena
flavorText: Its long, striking legs aren't just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand. Then, discard a card from it.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage and remove all Special Conditions from this Pokemon.

name: Turtonator
flavorText: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.
Attack1Text: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokemon.

name: Vikavolt
flavorText: It produces electricity via an electrical organ in its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokemon with shocking beams of electrical energy.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Energy card and a Lightning Energy card and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Discard 3 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Mimikyu
flavorText: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Tapu Koko
flavorText: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tapu Koko
flavorText: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tapu Koko

Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Tapu Bulu-GX

Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Bewear-GX

name: Espeon-GX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Umbreon-GX
Attack1Text: You may switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Decidueye-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Incineroar-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Fire Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

name: Primarina-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Jangmo-o
flavorText: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

name: Komala
flavorText: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, whenever you attach an Energy from your hand to it, it is now Asleep.
Attack1Text: This attack can be used if this Pokemon is Asleep. If it is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.

name: Cosmog
flavorText: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Alolan Meowth
flavorText: This Pokemon was not originally found in Alola. Human actions caused a surge in their numbers, and they went feral. They're prideful and crafty.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Togedemaru
flavorText: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokemon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tapu Lele
flavorText: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move any number of damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon to their other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Seviper
flavorText: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
Ability1Text: Put 1 more damage counter on your opponent's Poisoned Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Crabominable
flavorText: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokemon evolved and grew fur.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself for each damage counter on it.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Zygarde
flavorText: This is Zygarde's form at times when it uses its overwhelming power to suppress those who endanger the ecosystem.
Attack2Text: Discard a Darkness Energy and a Fairy Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Bewear
flavorText: This immensely dangerous Pokemon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Tapu Koko-GX
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of Lightning Energy from your other Pokemon to this Pokemon. If you do, switch this Pokemon with your Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Alolan Meowth

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Golisopod
flavorText: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawaterâ€”or even airâ€”right in two.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is a Pokemon-GX or a Pokemon-EX, this attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Dhelmise
flavorText: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.
Ability1Text: Your Metal Pokemon's attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lucario
flavorText: Not only does it perceive auras, but it has also gained the power to control them. It employs them in battle.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Decidueye
flavorText: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Tsareena-GX

name: Ho-Oh-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Necrozma-GX

name: Marshadow-GX

name: Charizard-GX
Attack2Text: Discard 3 Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Tapu Bulu
flavorText: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have used your GX attack, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Golisopod-GX
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Salazzle-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

name: Silvally
flavorText: Although its name was Type: Null at first, the boy who evolved it into this form gave it the name by which it is now known.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Alolan Raichu
flavorText: It only evolves to this form in the Alola region. According to researchers, its diet is one of the causes of this change.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Pheromosa-GX
Attack1Text: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Celesteela-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost.

name: Xurkitree-GX

Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent reveals their hand. Add a card you find there to their Prize cards face down. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Buzzwole-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Shining Ho-Oh
flavorText: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, move up to 2 basic Energy cards from this Pokemon to your Benched Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Kommo-o-GX

Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Salazzle
flavorText: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokemon between turns.

name: Regirock
flavorText: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
Ability1Text: Your Registeel's attacks do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Registeel
flavorText: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Regice is on your Bench, heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Mewtwo
flavorText: A Pokemon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Active Pokemon's attack do 20 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Shining Celebi
flavorText: This Pokemon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
Ability1Text: Each of your evolved Pokemon can use any attack from its previous Evolutions. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

name: Ho-Oh-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Pikachu
flavorText: A plan was recently announced to gather many Pikachu and make an electric power plant.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Shining Lugia
flavorText: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has an Ability, this attack does 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Zorua
flavorText: It changes so it looks like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zoroark-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Pokemon in play.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Marshadow
flavorText: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

name: Zoroark

Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Lucario

flavorText: Boiling blood, like plasma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

name: Gumshoos
flavorText: It adores having Rattata and Raticate for dinner, but as it's diurnal, it never encounters them. This Pokemon boasts incredible patience.

Attack2Text: Heal all damage from all of your Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Lycanroc
flavorText: Bathed in the setting sun of evening, Lycanroc has undergone a special kind of evolution. An intense fighting spirit underlies its calmness.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Dawn Wings Necrozma
flavorText: Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.

Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer's cap. Since the cap's not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Ash's Pikachu
flavorText: This form of Pikachu is somewhat rare. It wears the hat of its Trainer, who is also its partner.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Pheromosa
flavorText: One of the Ultra Beasts. It refuses to touch anything, perhaps because it senses some uncleanness in this world.
Attack2Text: If you have only 1 Prize card remaining, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Xurkitree
flavorText: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. It raided a power plant, so people think it energizes itself with electricity.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If you have exactly 3 Prize cards remaining, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Malamar
flavorText: It lures prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Lycanroc
flavorText: Bathed in the setting sun of evening, Lycanroc has undergone a special kind of evolution. An intense fighting spirit underlies its calmness.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Exeggcute
flavorText: Its six eggs use telepathy to communicate among themselves. It is believed to carry plant genes and the genes of other species.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Rockruff
flavorText: As they develop, their disposition grows more violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them too much to handle and abandon them.

name: Raikou-GX
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 50 damage to itself.

name: Zygarde-GX
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Dawn Wings Necrozma
flavorText: Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.
Attack1Text: If you have exactly 6 Prize cards remaining, this attack does 20 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Dusk Mane Necrozma
flavorText: This is its form with it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on its foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
Attack1Text: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon-GX or Pokemon-EX. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: Naganadel-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Ultra Beasts in play.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Ultra Necrozma-GX
Attack1Text: Discard all basic Psychic Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 80 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: You can use this attack only if the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is 6 or less. Put 6 damage counters on each of your opponent's Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Alolan Sandslash
flavorText: This Pokemon's steel spikes are sheathed in ice. Stabs from these spikes cause deep wounds and severe frostbite as well.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Alolan Ninetales
flavorText: Possessing a calm demeanor, this Pokemon was revered as a deity incarnate before it was identified as a regional variant of Ninetales.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Kyogre
flavorText: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Grand Wave during your next turn.

name: Manectric
flavorText: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
Ability1Text: If you go second, and if this Pokemon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokemon or on your Bench.
Attack1Text: You may attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Celesteela
flavorText: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
Attack1Text: If the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is exactly 6, this attack can be used for Metal.

name: Delcatty
flavorText: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon during your turn, you may put 2 Supporter cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Thundurus-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Tornadus-GX
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Latias
flavorText: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy and a Psychic Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Latios
flavorText: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokemon that dislikes fighting.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Reshiram-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Zekrom-GX
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is a Pokemon-GX or a Pokemon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 more damage for each heads.

name: Salamence-GX
Ability1Text: Your Pokemon in play have no Retreat Cost, except Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Salamence
flavorText: It flies around on its wings, which have grown in at last. In its happiness, it gushes hot flames, burning up the fields it passes over.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with their Active Pokemon.

name: White Kyurem-GX
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Kyurem
flavorText: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Moltres
flavorText: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokemon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Articuno
flavorText: A legendary bird Pokemon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Zapdos
flavorText: A legendary bird Pokemon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Leafeon-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 50 damage from 1 of your Pokemon that has any Energy attached to it.
Attack2Text: For each of your Benched Basic Pokemon, search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokemon and put it onto that Pokemon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Glaceon-GX
Ability1Text: As long as this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Pokemon-GX and Pokemon-EX in play, in their hand, and in their discard pile have no Abilities, except for Freezing Gaze.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Suicune
flavorText: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokemon with 1 of their Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Raikou
flavorText: This rough Pokemon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.
Attack1Text: If you have any Lightning Energy cards in the Lost Zone, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Giratina
flavorText: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, put 1 damage counter on 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Put 4 damage counters on 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Tapu Lele
flavorText: As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.
Ability1Text: Whenever you attach a Pokemon Tool card that has "Fairy Charm" in its name from your hand to this Pokemon during your turn, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokemon Confused.

name: Rowlet
flavorText: This wary Pokemon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Salandit
flavorText: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Kingdra-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Dragonite-GX
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feel stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon can't be Paralyzed.

name: Charizard
flavorText: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokemon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Zapdos
flavorText: A legendary Pokemon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, this attack does 70 more damage. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness.

name: Nidoqueen
flavorText: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Pokemon that isn't a Pokemon-GX or Pokemon-EX, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Evolution Pokemon on your Bench.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal a Trainer card you find there, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle the other cards back into your deck, and this Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Mimikyu
flavorText: A lonely Pokemon, it conceals its terrifying appearance beneath an old rag so it can get closer to people and other Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a card for each card in your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Deoxys
flavorText: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokemon. It appears where auroras are seen.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy from 1 of your Pokemon to 1 of your Deoxys.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Psycho Boost attack's base damage is 50.

name: Ultra Necrozma
flavorText: This is its form when it has absorbed overwhelming light energy. It fires laser beams from all over its body.
Attack1Text: If the total of both players' remaining Prize cards is 6 or less, discard all Energy attached to this Pokemon, and this attack does 100 more damage.

name: Magikarp & Wailord-GX
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has at least 7 extra Water Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Celebi & Venusaur-GX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.

name: Pikachu & Zekrom-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has at least 3 extra Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Eevee & Snorlax-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Attack1Text: Attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is an Evolution Pokemon, this attack does 120 more damage.

name: Detective Pikachu
flavorText: He loves to show off his vast knowledge. This expressive Pikachu is like a middle-aged man.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals their hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Flareon-GX
Attack1Text: You may attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Vaporeon-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from your Active Water Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Heal all damage from all of your Water Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Jolteon-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Eevee-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokemon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokemon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokemon was put into play.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Eevee-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokemon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokemon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokemon was put into play.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Eevee-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokemon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokemon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokemon was put into play.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Meltan
flavorText: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Meltan and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Melmetal-GX
Ability1Text: This Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Attach any number of Metal Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Volcanion
flavorText: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. If you go second and it's your first turn, instead search for up to 3 Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: If you have at least 4 Fire Energy in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Stakataka
flavorText: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
Ability1Text: If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, this Pokemon's maximum HP is 200.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Melmetal
flavorText: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Metal Pokemon from your hand. If you do, heal 100 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Persian
flavorText: Although the jewel on its forehead appears to be a different color than those of Alolan Persian, it's mostly made of the same material.
Ability1Text: Ignore all Energy in the attack costs of each of your Pokemon in play that has the Caturday attack.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: Current studies show it can evolve into an incredible eight different species of Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Typhlosion
flavorText: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Fire Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Flareon
flavorText: If it inhales deeply, that's a sign it's about to attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Alolan Marowak-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. If a Pokemon is Knocked Out by this damage, put that Pokemon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Kangaskhan-GX
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Confused, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Blastoise-GX
Ability1Text: This Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Shuffle any amount of Water Energy from your Pokemon into your deck. This attack does 60 damage for each card you shuffled into your deck in this way.
Attack2Text: Attach any number of Water Energy cards from your hand to your Pokemon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Detective Pikachu
flavorText: He was the partner of Tim's father, Harry, who has gone missing. This Pikachu loves the dark coffee at the Hi-Hat Cafe.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Mewtwo & Mew-GX
Ability1Text: This Pokemon can use the attacks of any Pokemon-GX or Pokemon-EX on your Bench or in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
Attack1Text: If this Pokemon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Lucario & Melmetal-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Garchomp & Giratina-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Detective Pikachu
flavorText: Skilled in deduction, he's a self-proclaimed "great detective." His detective hat is his trademark.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Charizard-GX
Attack1Text: Discard the top 8 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to this Pokemon.

name: Mewtwo-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Greninja-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is the last card in your hand, you may play it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Put 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your opponent's hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Bulbasaur
flavorText: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokemon.

name: Psyduck
flavorText: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.

name: Snubbull
flavorText: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Reshiram & Charizard-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Flare Strike during your next turn.

name: Amoonguss
flavorText: They show off their Poke Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokemon are fooled by this.
Ability1Text: Whenever you play a Pokemon that has the Spore attack from your hand during your turn, you may leave your opponent's Active Pokemon Asleep and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Tapu Fini
flavorText: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Ultra Beasts in play, this attack can be used for Colorless.

name: Necrozma
flavorText: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokemon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Special Energy attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Terrakion
flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokemon is spoken of in legends.
Attack1Text: If all of your Benched Pokemon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Sudowoodo
flavorText: It's so popular with the elderly that there's a magazine devoted to this Pokemon. Fans obsess over the particular length and angle of its arms.
Attack2Text: If you don't have a Stadium card in play, this attack does nothing.

name: Vikavolt
flavorText: It has an organ that generates electricity in its abdomen. It concentrates energy in its strong jaws and fires off powerful jolts of electricity.
Ability1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this Pokemon has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy from this Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 100 more damage.

name: Stakataka
flavorText: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
Ability1Text: If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, this Pokemon's maximum HP is 200.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Moltres & Zapdos & Articuno-GX
Attack2Text: Shuffle this Pokemon and all cards attached to it into your deck. If this Pokemon has at least 1 extra Fire, Water, and Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 110 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Charizard-GX
Attack2Text: (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Gyarados-GX
Attack2Text: (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Raichu-GX
Attack2Text: (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Mewtwo
flavorText: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Mew
flavorText: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokemon.
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokemon by your opponent's attacks.
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Porygon-Z-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Special Energy from this Pokemon. If you do, heal 80 damage from it.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Search your deck for up to 10 cards and discard them. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Trevenant & Dusknoir-GX
Attack1Text: Choose 2 random cards from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals those cards and shuffles them into their deck.
Attack2Text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon will be Knocked Out. If this Pokemon has at least 1 extra Psychic Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), discard all Energy from your opponent's Active Pokemon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Buzzwole
flavorText: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
Ability1Text: This Pokemon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokemon for each Prize card you have taken (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Entei
flavorText: A Pokemon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
Attack1Text: If any of your Pokemon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during their last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

name: Phione
flavorText: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokemon with 1 of their Benched Pokemon. If you do, discard all cards attached to this Pokemon and put it on the bottom of your deck.

name: Blacephalon
flavorText: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.
Attack1Text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like. If your opponent has exactly 3 Prize cards remaining, put 12 damage counters on them instead.

name: Mismagius
flavorText: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokemon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Terrakion
flavorText: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokemon is spoken of in legends.
Attack1Text: If all of your Benched Pokemon have at least 1 damage counter on them, this attack does 150 more damage.

name: Celebi
flavorText: This Pokemon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokemon-GX with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Victini
flavorText: This Pokemon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards of different types and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Charizard
flavorText: This Pokemon was created by Mewtwo to prove that copies can be even more powerful than their originals.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokemon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack1Text: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokemon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Pikachu
flavorText: Its nature is to store up electricity. Forests where nests of Pikachu live are dangerous, since the trees are so often struck by lightning.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy from this Pokemon.

name: Armored Mewtwo
flavorText: Mewtwo was on a rampage searching for meaning to its existence in this world when Giovanni suppressed and controlled its power.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon can't attack during your next turn.

name: Venusaur & Snivy-GX
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, when you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to it, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with their Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. If this Pokemon has at least 2 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), heal all damage from all of your Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Charizard & Braixen-GX
Attack1Text: You may search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: Attach 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokemon in any way you like. If this Pokemon has at least 1 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Burned and Confused. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Pikachu-GX
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Eevee-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokemon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokemon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokemon was put into play.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Pikachu
flavorText: It's in its nature to store electricity. It feels stressed now and then if it's unable to fully discharge the electricity.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: The question of why only Eevee has such unstable genes has still not been solved.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

name: Alolan Sandslash-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Leafeon
flavorText: Although it doesn't like disputes, it will sharpen the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has to protect its friends.
Attack1Text: Heal all damage from 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Glaceon
flavorText: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below â€“75 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Carracosta-GX
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has full HP, it takes 90 less damage from your opponent's attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Put any number of Pokemon that evolve from Unidentified Fossil from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Espeon & Deoxys-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Psychic Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Put 10 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like. If this Pokemon has at least 3 extra Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), put 20 damage counters on them instead. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Umbreon & Darkrai-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon-GX or Benched Pokemon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from their hand during their next turn. If this Pokemon has at least 5 extra Darkness Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), your opponent's Active Pokemon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Eevee-GX
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Pokemon in your hand that evolves from Eevee, you may put that card onto this Pokemon to evolve it. Before evolving, heal all damage from this Pokemon. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or on the turn this Pokemon was put into play.
Attack2Text: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

name: Regigigas
flavorText: It is said to have made Pokemon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
Attack2Text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Aipom
flavorText: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
Attack1Text: Discard random cards from your opponent's hand until they have 5 cards in their hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Mismagius
flavorText: Feared for its wrath and the curses it spreads, this Pokemon will also, on a whim, cast spells that help people.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has exactly 9 damage counters on it, that Pokemon is Knocked Out.

name: Reshiram & Charizard-GX
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This Pokemon can't use Flare Strike during your next turn.

name: Pikachu & Zekrom-GX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon. Then, shuffle your deck.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has at least 3 extra Lightning Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack's cost), this attack does 170 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
